data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText:
refl,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero b,
rw add_zero (a + b),
refl,
rw add_succ (a + b),
rw add_succ b,
rw add_succ a,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c p,
rw add_zero (succ a),
rw add_zero (a),
refl,
rw add_succ (succ a),
rw p,
rw add_succ a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction a with c hd,
rw zero_add (b),
rw add_zero (b),
refl,
rw add_succ (b),
rw succ_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction n with a hd,
rw zero_add,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
refl,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_assoc a b c,
rw add_comm b c,
rw ← add_assoc a c b,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hd,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_zero,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hd,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw ← succ_eq_add_one,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hd,
rw add_zero a,
rw mul_zero t,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw ← add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_right_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_mul,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw hd,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with c hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw add_mul,
rw mul_add,
rw hd,
rw mul_one,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw mul_comm,
rw mul_comm a c,
rw mul_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with n hd,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction m with o hd,
rw zero_add,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_assoc,
rw mul_comm,
rw mul_left_comm,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with o hd,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
simp,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with o hd,
simp,
rw pow_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw pow_add a,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
simp,
repeat {rw mul_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw mul_one},
simp,
repeat {rw add_mul},
repeat {rw mul_add},
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply f,
exact p,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros p q f,
apply q,
apply p,
exact f,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros j k l,
apply k,
apply j,
exact l,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)

(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intros q p,
exact q,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
apply a,
exact c,
apply b,
exact c,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
apply b,
apply a,
exact c,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b c,
apply b,
apply a,
exact c,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros a b,
cases a with p q,
cases b with r s,
split,
exact p,
exact s,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b,
cases a with r s,
cases b with t u,
split,
cc,
cc,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros a b,
cases a with r s,
cases b with t u,
split,
cc,
cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
right,
exact a,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
cases a with b c,
right,
exact b,
left,
exact c,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro a,
cases a with j k,
cases k with m,
left,
split,
exact j,
exact m,
right,
split,
exact j,
exact k,
intro a,
cases a with j k,
split,
cases j with u i,
exact u,
left,
cases j with g h,
exact h,
split,
cases k with t y,
exact t,
right,
cases k with e r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
exfalso,
cases a with p q,
apply q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have a:= succ_inj(hs),
exact a,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have a := succ_inj(h),
have b := succ_inj(a),
exact b,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
cases a with c,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
intro a,
cases a with b,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro c,
induction t with u hd,
exact c,
rw add_succ a at c,
rw add_succ b at c,
have d := succ_inj c,
have e := hd(d),
exact e,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm t a,
rw add_comm t b,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
